channel.title: Need Help With My Forums
channel.description:
Hey does anyone know how to add like at the top, for example on mopar it says members, how do I do that but do it for webclient, vote, donate, etc... Please help? I am using a phpbb3 forums. If you want to look at it more its turmoilpvpz.net (not advertising it)
here is what it looks like. I just want to add a vote, donate, and webclient button at the top like most server have. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/yij9j.png[/img]

item.title: Need Help With My Forums

item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

https://blog.phpbb.com/2010/01/31/adding-navigational-links-to-your-mod-breadcrumbs/
